channel.title: ~~~ Ragnos Isle ~~~ [12GB/s] [24/7] [No lag] [Fixed bugs!] [317 loading 600+]
channel.description:
~ Make an account and post here http://ragnosisle.com/index.php?topic=10.msg17#msg17a and receive 50m (50,000,000) coins!~ Only through October 1st! Forum = www.Ragnosisle.com
Webclient = http://ragnosisle.com/play/webclient.php
Desktop Client = http://ragnosisle.com/downloadableclient/client.jar
Ragnos Isle is one of a kind type of server you will find yourself exploring and finding shops and areas, instead of the same old boring thing we want you to have fun and stay! This was made to last and have some adventure and challange. Will you be ready?
PKING Godswords Dungoneering Torva All Spirit Shields Advanced Skilling Morrigans Dclaws Bossing Pernix Slayer Virtus Statius Vesta
Pictures DUNGEONEERING [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/zwiwra.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/1z86fb.png[/img] DICING [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/15ewbcx.png[/img] CORPORAL [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/fz6v07.png[/img]
Thanks for viewing this page! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/far789.png[/img]
[URL=http://s11.flagcounter.com/more/rJfz][IMG]http://s11.flagcounter.com/count/rJfz/bg_FFFFFF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_8/maxflags_248/viewers_0/labels_0/pageviews_0/flags_0/[/img][/URL]

item.title: ~~~ Ragnos Isle ~~~ [12GB/s] [24/7] [No lag] [Fixed bugs!] [317 loading 600+]
item.dc:creator: @tisko1 tisko1
item.description:
@tisko1 wrote:

many dupes/glitches.

when you are in combat, you can do ::noclip. (the noclip works)
Thus, you can get to places like donor island, yes i went there.
Also, certain accounts still have the yell tag, for example: my account i made was named “exe” and when i yelled i had head admin tag. People thoughti was admin lol.

Also, there is improved versions of this source, one is trisidax or however u spell it. I recomend you either get that one, or choose a different source. There is just no original stuff, and theres so many bugs. ANyways…Goodluck

Read full topic
